text: (Allah) kuruvan; "jinkal, manitarkal kuttattarkaliliruntu unkalukku mun cenravarkalutan ninkalum (naraka) neruppil nulaiyunkal." Ovvoru kuttattarum, narakattil nulaiyumpotellam, (tankalukku mun, anku vantulla) tam inattaraic capipparkal; avarkal yavarum narakattaiyataintu vitta pinnar, pin vantavarkal mun vantavarkalaipparri, "enkal iraivane! Ivarkal tan enkalai vali ketuttarkal; atalal ivarkalukku narakattil iru matanku vetanaiyaik kotu" enru colvarkal.
